name: China Hydroelectric Corporation
description: China Hydroelectric Corporation is a leading renewable energy company focused on the development, operation, and management of hydroelectric power plants in China. Established in 2007, the company aims to capitalize on China’s vast water resources to produce clean energy and contribute to the country’s sustainable development goals. CHN operates several hydroelectric projects across various provinces, delivering substantial amounts of power to the grid while minimizing environmental impacts. The company is committed to advancing green energy initiatives and has invested heavily in modernizing its facilities with state-of-the-art technology to enhance efficiency and capacity. Alongside hydroelectric generation, China Hydroelectric Corporation is exploring opportunities in other renewable energy sectors, including wind and solar power, to diversify its energy portfolio and reduce reliance on fossil fuels. With a strong focus on sustainability and environmental stewardship, CHN is well-positioned to play a critical role in the transition to a more sustainable energy landscape in China and beyond.
